```{r}
library(readr)
NY_cases <- read_csv("C:/Users/ignac/OneDrive - Universidad de Chile/Escritorio/Practica-II-Covid-1/Presentacion/NY_cases")
NY_deaths <- read_csv("C:/Users/ignac/OneDrive - Universidad de Chile/Escritorio/Practica-II-Covid-1/Presentacion/NY_deaths")

NY_cases = NY_cases[[1]]
NY_deaths = NY_deaths[[1]]
```

```{r}
# Sacamos el tiempo de delay

windows()
lm <- 40
mutual_NY_cases = mutual(NY_cases, lag.max=lm)

windows()
lm <- 40
mutual_NY_deaths = mutual(NY_deaths, lag.max=lm)

# Lo pasamos a csv para trabajar en python

df <- data.frame(mutual_NY_cases = as.vector(mutual_NY_cases),
                 mutual_NY_deaths = as.vector(mutual_NY_deaths))

write.csv(df,"C:\\Users\\ignac\\OneDrive - Universidad de Chile\\Escritorio\\Practica-II-Covid-1\\Presentacion\\AMI_NY.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
```{r}
# Veamos una estimacion de la Theiler Window

library("nonlinearTseries", lib.loc="C:/Users/ignac/anaconda3/envs/rstudio/lib/R/library")

windows()
require(nonlinearTseries)
spaceTimePlot(time.series=NY_cases,embedding.dim=3,time.lag=4,
              time.step=1,number.time.steps=50, numberPercentages=10,do.plot=TRUE,
              main="",xlab="Separation in time",ylab="Separation in space")
# da 12


windows()
require(nonlinearTseries)
spaceTimePlot(time.series=NY_deaths,embedding.dim=3,time.lag=9,
              time.step=1,number.time.steps=50, numberPercentages=10,do.plot=TRUE,
              main="",xlab="Separation in time",ylab="Separation in space")
# 25 (muy mala)

```

```{r}
# Calculamos la dimension de inmersion con FNN

windows()
m.max<- 6 # embedding dimensions: from 1 to m_max
d<- 5 # tentative time deFRy (see below)
tw<- 12 # Theiler window
rt<- 10 # escape factor
eps<- sd(NY_cases)/10 # neighbourhood diameter
fn_NY_cases <- false.nearest(NY_cases,m.max,d,tw,rt,eps)
fn_NY_cases

plot(fn_NY_cases)     # da una dimension de inmersion m = 5



windows()
m.max<- 6 # embedding dimensions: from 1 to m_max
d<- 4 # tentative time deFRy (see below)
tw<- 25#13 # Theiler window
rt<- 10 # escape factor
eps<- sd(NY_deaths)/10 # neighbourhood diameter
fn_NY_deaths <- false.nearest(NY_deaths,m.max,d,tw,rt,eps)
fn_NY_deaths

plot(fn_NY_deaths)     # da una dimension de inmersion m = 3


```
```{r}
# Calculemos los MCLE

windows()
S_nu_NY_cases <- lyap_k(NY_cases,m=3,d=5,t=12,k=4,ref=200,s=40,eps=0.2)
plot(S_nu_NY_cases,xlab = expression(paste(nu)),ylab=expression(paste("S",(nu))))

S_nu_NY_cases = as.vector(S_nu_NY_cases)

windows()
S_nu_NY_deaths <- lyap_k(NY_deaths,m=3,d=4,t=18,k=6,ref=200,s=40,eps=0.2)
plot(S_nu_NY_deaths,xlab = expression(paste(nu)),ylab=expression(paste("S",(nu))))

S_nu_NY_deaths = as.vector(S_nu_NY_deaths)

```
```{r}

df_S_nu_NY <- data.frame(S_nu_NY_cases = as.vector(S_nu_NY_cases),
                 S_nu_NY_deaths = as.vector(S_nu_NY_deaths))

write.csv(df_S_nu_NY,"C:\\Users\\ignac\\OneDrive - Universidad de Chile\\Escritorio\\Practica-II-Covid-1\\Presentacion\\S_nu_NY.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
